member.name: D3D12_DEBUG_DEVICE_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_SETTINGS
member.summary: Describes settings used by GPU-Based Validation.

member.name: D3D12_DEBUG_DEVICE_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_SETTINGS.MaxMessagesPerCommandList
member.summary: Specifies a UINT that limits the number of messages that can be stored in the GPU-Based Validation message log. The default value is 256. Since many identical errors can be produced in a single Draw/Dispatch call it may be useful to increase this number. Note this can become a memory burden if a large number of command lists are used as there is a committed message log per command list.

member.name: D3D12_DEBUG_DEVICE_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_SETTINGS.DefaultShaderPatchMode
member.summary: Specifies the that GPU-Based Validation uses when injecting validation code into shaders, except when overridden by per-command-list GPU-Based Validation settings (see ). The default value is D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_SHADER_PATCH_MODE_UNGUARDED_VALIDATION.

member.name: D3D12_DEBUG_DEVICE_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_SETTINGS.PipelineStateCreateFlags
member.summary: Specifies one of the that indicates how GPU-Based Validation handles patching pipeline states. The default value is D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_PIPELINE_STATE_CREATE_FLAG_NONE.
